00001 // $Id: version.h,v 1.7 2006/05/26 12:14:57 richter Exp $
00002 
00003 /*
00004 25.04.2004 version 0.1
00005  - implementation of ioctl functions:
00006   IOCLT_READ_REG, IOCLT_WRITE_REG, IOCLT_GET_MSGBUF_IN_SIZE, IOCLT_GET_MSGBUF_OUT_SIZE,
00007   IOCLT_GET_REGFILE_SIZE, IOCLT_GET_VERSION
00008  - access restriction to 4 byte two for byte words abandoned, each number of bytes can be read/written now
00009  
00010 26.04.2004 version 0.2
00011  - new default values for the message buffer size, new design has 1024 byte in and out buffer
00012 
00013 04.01.2005 version 0.3
00014  - log messages concentrated in one log function which can be switched off easily
00015  - log flags introduced for different levels of messages 
00016  - 'release' version introduced, activated with 'make release=yes'
00017  - this is just a test
00018 
00019 04.05.2005 version 0.4
00020  - renamed to rcubus_driver
00021  - bugfix in ioctl read/write register
00022  - changed default regfile address, now 0x80000060
00023 25.05.2006 version 0.6
00024  - buffer size check in module init removed in order to make the driver more general
00025    if all 3 buffers are provided, the buffers are assumed to represent the Msg
00026    Buffer Interface and the memory check is performed 
00027  - bugfixes in driver lock
00028  - master lock introduced 
00029  */
00030 #define DRIVER_MAJOR_VERSION_NUMBER 0
00031 #define DRIVER_MINOR_VERSION_NUMBER 6
00032 #define DRIVER_BUILD_TIME "04.05.2005"
